No.  Sorry, I can just point you to 84.11.06.

The next morning things took a serious turn when Mr Hashe was kicked against the head and became unconscious.

I just want to put it to you - I don't want you not to have any knowledge of this or be unaware of this, that I have knowledge of other testimony that was given and that is that the Vlakplaas contingent - their assaults, were the worst that one has ever heard of.
Mr de Jager, that is my instructions and that will be their testimony.

Mr Chairman, and without hereby expressing any desire whatsoever to prolong proceedings but up to a stage both my learned friends on the other side have been punting a theory that these people were not killed and they haven't asked Mr Nieuwoudt a single question about that.
